name: Concentric Colorfields #1 + Plastikman ‘Konstant’
description: Concentric Colorfields #1 rendered with the music of Plastikman titled ‘Konstant’. The video and audio have different looping periods and they are not synced by any parameters. This is an experiment on the synesthesia of color and sound, part of a continuing audio-visual collaboration between Ali M. Demirel and Richie Hawtin. Collectors will receive a ProRes version of the loop for playback at various devices.
